titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the redresse of certaine grievances complained of by the inhabitants of the county of Oxford
Proclamations. 1643-06-03
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: royal arms with initials "C R".
Dated at end: Oxford, this third day of June, in the nineteenth year if His Majesties reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
